pageProps.title: Your Masturbation Method might be Ruining Your Sexual Life?
pageProps.metaDesc:
Before we get started let's clear one thing up masturbation is perfectly normal and healthy for both men comes with numerous physical and mental benefits.

However, for several reasons, some people might experience pain when they masturbate. We know around 75 percent of women and people with vulvas will experience some pain during masturbation or sex in their lifetimes, but discomfort can happen to men, women, and people of all genders.
